args.query: If f is integrable on [a_n,b_n] for each n and a_n -> a, b_n -> b then f integrable on [a,b] and integrals converge

args.content:
import Mathlib

open Filter

theorem riemann_integral_of_limits_of_subintervals
  {a b : ‚Ñù} {f : ‚Ñù ‚Üí ‚Ñù} {a_n b_n : ‚Ñï ‚Üí ‚Ñù}
  (hbound : BoundedOn f (Icc a b))
  (hseq : ‚àÄ n, a < a_n n ‚àß a_n n < b_n n ‚àß b_n n < b)
  (ha : Tendsto a_n atTop (ùìù a))
  (hb : Tendsto b_n atTop (ùìù b))
  (hints : ‚àÄ n, Riemann.integrable_on f (Icc (a_n n) (b_n n))) :
  Riemann.integrable_on f (Icc a b) ‚àß
  Tendsto (fun n => ‚à´ x in a_n n..b_n n, f x) atTop (ùìù (‚à´ x in a..b, f x)) := by sorry
